body.description: Steve is charged on his card ending 4242

mappings.response: =string.concat("Customer Id: ",$activity[createCustomer].output.customers.id, " Card Id: ",$activity[createCard].output.customers.id," Charge Id: ",$activity[createCharge].output.charges.id," Capture charge: ",string.tostring($activity[captureCharge].output.charges.captured)," Subscription Id: ",$activity[createSubscription].output.subscriptions.id," Refund Id: ",$activity[createRefund].output.refunds.id,"Subscription canceled: ",string.tostring($activity[cancelSubscription].output.subscriptions.canceled_at)," Query Charge: ",string.tostring($activity[queryCharge].output.charges.amount_refunded)," Account Balance: ",string.tostring($activity[queryAcBalance].output.balance.available[0])," Customer Deleted: ",string.tostring($activity[deleteCustomer].output.customers.deleted))

settings.name: Stripe301V03
